column2: visiting this spot was the one and only time I've ever had ramen (the real stuff
column3: not the broke college student variety)
column4: and it was fantastic.  I had the spicy chicken ramen and it really hit the spot.  I really liked the customization options of adding things such as seasoned egg
column8: etc.  I'll be going back.  Just gonna have to find a time when it isn't so dang busy because it is always packed!!
